Uses of Class
cctair.Aircraft

    • Uses of Aircraft in cctair

      Subclasses of Aircraft in cctair 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Airplane
      An Airplane object stores characteristics inherited from the Aircraft class and also ones specific to airplanes.
      Constructors in cctair with parameters of type Aircraft 
      Constructor and Description
      Flight(java.lang.String origin, java.lang.String destination, java.time.LocalTime departureTime, java.time.LocalTime arrivalTime, java.time.LocalDate flightDate, Aircraft assignedAircraft)
      Constructor for the Flight class that receives the origin of the flight, its destination, departure time, arrival time, date and assigned aircraft.
